name: Crazy Bull Simulator
description:
Crazy Bull Simulator

Bull gone be crazy and trying to broke all property of a city,go with bull,give a way to bull,broke the items and make a score,use a joystick to give a direction to bull and use a jump button by which the bull can jump.this game includes HD Graphics so that user can enjoy while playing.make a score with broke the items.choose your scene and go with a bull.download this game and make a lot's of fun.

key features of this game

-> HD Graphics

-> Use a joystick to play

-> Broke The items and make a score

-> Share your score with your friends and colleagues

-> user friendly game.
